Description: Limestone ostracon: on recto and verso respectively eight and ten lines of a text with records of work and absence from work by several workmen. The verso text is faded in many places.
Dimensions: Height: 17 centimetres (when both pieces are joined)
Width: 26.70 centimetres (when both pieces are joined)
Curator's comments: Attached to 1912,0210.70 (EA50730) Bibliography: K. Kitchen, 'Ramesside Inscriptions' Vll (Oxford, 1989), 360 - 61; S.Wimmer, 'Hieratische Paläographie der nicht-literarischen Ostraka der 19. und 20. Dynastie' (Ägypten und Altes Testament 29) (Wiesbaden, 1996), pp. 35-6 (transcription recto) and 137 (facsimile).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (136380) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/136380)
